name: Richell USA 94159 Freestanding Pet Gate Hl - Origami White

reviews.name: Richell Freestanding HL Pet Gate, Origami White
reviews.reviewText:
I know these are for indoors but I bought 2 for my deck. They look so nice and my dog cannot move them. We'll have to see what the weather does to them.

I had to get the biggest size. So they were expensive compared to other gates.

They were easy to put together.
reviews.title: look really nice.

reviews.name: Richell Freestanding HL Pet Gate, Origami White
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy. Easy to put together. Just what we needed for our new puppy.
reviews.title: Pet gate

reviews.name: Richell Freestanding HL Pet Gate, Origami White
reviews.reviewText: The Pet Gate arrived earlier than expected. We had some problems with what was left and what was right in putting it together. After getting it together, it was the perfect size to keep all 7of my dogs out of the formal living room. The height and width were the right size needed to restrain my dogs.
reviews.title: A great pet gate.

reviews.name: Richell Freestanding HL Pet Gate, Origami White
reviews.reviewText: I am not a handy person by any means, but my sister and I put this together quite easily in minutes following the instructions. It is very high quality, sturdy and looks nice too.
reviews.title: High Quality, Looks Great Too!

reviews.name: Richell Freestanding HL Pet Gate, Origami White
reviews.reviewText: I needed a wide gate for the opening to my kitchen. This gate certainly fit the bill. I really like this gate!!! It's well made and looks lovely. I really like the fact that it's free standing. I would highly recommend this gate.
reviews.title: Love this gate
